contentTypes.name: Page
contentTypes.description: Content type to create page and structure content as tree.

validations.message: Only bold, italic, underline, code, superscript, and subscript marks are allowed

Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, asset, table, link to Url, link to entry, link to asset, and inline entry nodes are allowed

contentTypes.name: Block Content Promo
contentTypes.description: Content type for handling rich blocks that can change their view as needed.

validations.message: Only bold, italic, underline, code, superscript, and subscript marks are allowed

contentTypes.name: Custom Content
contentTypes.description: Content type designed for multi-purpose use across various sections of a content.

contentTypes.name: Block Content Filter
contentTypes.description: Block to list, search and filter contents using facets and sorting.

contentTypes.name: View: Grid Cards

settings.helpText: Name of the content to identify in admin editor.
Promo main media asset of the content.
Remember follow the query string format to prevent bad links. E.g. ?param1=value1&param2=value or #section or ?param1=value1#section, etc.
Name to identify the content in admin editor.
Multiple selections only work for the Algolia engine.
Extra conditions to apply to the contents. It must be compatible with the search engine selected.

description.[CF_LOCALE]: Find in-depth information about Next.js features and API.
